name: Airport Parking Bus
description:
3D airport bus parking simulator is an other parking game in the series of parking at airport by shiningstar. on this airport game u need to park bus safely on terminal and road track. you need to avoid different hurdles on the airport so that u can reach to the desired goal safely.
this is a realistic 3D parking game if you like to drive heavy vehicles like bus than u are going to love this game. This game will make u learn how to park a bus on the airport. You think its easy to park a bus like car? No its very difficult to park bus than car and parking it on Air port is much more harder, but this will be a great fun and you are going to find it challenging too because as an air port bus driver its your duty to guide the passengers to the terminal safely. After landing they need to pick up there bags sit in the bus and continue there journey towards terminal. Before having this responsibility to pick up passengers in your shuttle bus service you should be fully trained how to park a bus on the airport.

In this exciting 3D airprt bus parking simulator parking slots are drafted to grasp your intrust. its a challenge for you to pass through parking lots and nearby airplanes and airport traffic.
Make your own records and show your real skills!
